instructions.name: cancel_challenge
docs: Creator cancels a challenge BEFORE it starts

instructions.name: claim_forfeited_stakes
docs: Platform treasury claims forfeited stakes (when no winners)

instructions.name: claim_payout
docs: Winner claims their payout (original stake + bonus from losers)

instructions.name: claim_refund
docs: Participant claims refund after challenge is cancelled

instructions.name: close_challenge
docs: Close challenge account to reclaim rent (after all payouts complete)

instructions.name: close_escrow_vault
docs: Close the escrow vault to reclaim rent (after all payouts/forfeitures claimed)

instructions.name: close_participant
docs: Close participant account to reclaim rent

instructions.name: create_challenge
docs: Create a new challenge escrow via the factory
Each challenge has its own isolated escrow account

instructions.name: finalize_settlement
docs: Oracle finalizes settlement and calculates payouts
1. No winners → All stakes go to platform treasury
2. Everyone wins → Return stakes only (no bonus)

instructions.name: initialize_factory
docs: This creates the root factory account that will create all challenge escrows

instructions.name: join_challenge
docs: User joins a challenge by staking USDC
Must join BEFORE the challenge starts (no late joins)

instructions.name: record_proof
docs: Oracle records a proof submission for a participant
Called after off-chain verification approves the daily proof

instructions.name: settle_challenge
docs: Oracle marks the challenge as ended (after end_ts)

errors.name: ForfeitedStakesUnclaimed
errors.msg: Forfeited stakes not yet claimed by treasury

errors.name: MaxProofsReached
errors.msg: Maximum proofs already recorded for this participant

types.name: ChallengeEscrow
docs: Challenge Escrow - Individual escrow for each challenge

types.name: EscrowFactory
docs: Escrow Factory - Root contract that creates challenge escrows

fields.name: authority
docs: Authority that can update factory settings

fields.name: treasury
docs: Treasury account to receive forfeited stakes (no winners scenario)

fields.name: oracle
docs: Oracle pubkey for proof verification and settlement
